make_ubiops_spec[source]

make_ubiops_spec(name, val, type_mapping)

Takes a key and example value (val) from an output dict and infers the ubiops type definition.

Example:

input_spec = [
    make_ubiops_spec(
        name=k,
        val=v,
        type_mapping=ubiops_type_mapping)
    for k, v in out['row'].items()
    # if v
]

## out
output_spec = [
    {'name': 'rgb_of_Background/undefined',
     'data_type': {'label': 'Array of integers', 'value': 'array_int'}},
    {'name': 'rgb_of_Lips',
     'data_type': {'label': 'Array of integers', 'value': 'array_int'}},
     ...]
